about_the_game:
Get ready to shine! Ordinary outfits just won’t do on the battlefield.

Grab our cool costume set.

This set includes:

• Knight of Maxmilian

• Golden Boy

• Pharaoh

• American Football Jersey

• Baseball

This DLC is for those who didn’t buy the deluxe edition only.
detailed_description:
Get ready to shine! Ordinary outfits just won’t do on the battlefield.

Grab our cool costume set.

name: HolidayParty - Deluxe Edition Upgrade

subs.option_text: Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl - Deluxe Upgrade - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400F @ 2.6 GHz or better or AMD Ryzen 5 5600x @ 3.7 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F @ 2.5 GHz or better or Ryzen 5 5600X @ 3.7 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers

short_description: Get ready to shine! Ordinary outfits just won’t do on the battlefield. Grab our cool costume set.
supported_languages:
English*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
